name: Skeleton Warrior Evo Party
description:
"Being one of the evil forces in this game world, we are hastily chopped by swordmen, shot by archers, instantly killed by fireballs or icebolts or wind blast from the wizards...If I can fight back a bit, I can still die with dignity! Yet it is not easy, let me find some fellows to train my skills first." It is the heartfelt wish of a junior skeleton warrior.

Are there only failures and failures in tiny skeleton's life?
Are there only heroes or dragons being the most mighty ones on the earth?
What great things will the skeleton warrior achieve for his dignity?

- Draw the fresh picture of RPG world from the heartfelt wishes of the skeleton warrior.

- Not interested in stereotyping hero level-up story? Experience the promotion story of the skeleton warrior!

- Gratify your gene of rebel.

- A casual relaxing game crafted with heart

- I'm a dreamer, but I'm not the only one
